Subject: Successful sign-in from a new location

Dear [Username],

We wanted to inform you that a sign-in to your Microsoft account was successfully completed from a new location. 

Location: [City, Country]
Date and Time: [Date, Time]

If this sign-in was not done by you, please secure your account by changing your password immediately. You can also review your recent account activity and manage your security settings by visiting your account page.

As always, we recommend enabling two-step verification for an extra layer of security on your account.

If you have any concerns or questions regarding this sign-in, please don't hesitate to contact our support team.

Thank you for choosing Microsoft.

Sincerely,
Microsoft Security Team
